title: Designing and the anticancer activity of chitosan and chitosan oligosaccharide lactate nanobeads loaded with Biginelli hybrid
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31526-31534
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05783J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nenad Janković, Jovana Ristovski, Željko Žižak, Milica Radan, Sandra Cvijić, Katarina Nikolić, Nenad L. Ignjatović
This study focuses on the designing and characterization, and anticancer evaluation of chitosan-based nanoparticles (NPs) loaded (enriched) with a Biginelli hybrid compound (BH).
